Game Over!
Harvey Dent organised a charity gala to support victims of domestic violence. All the big names of Gotham are here! People are currently mingling in the main room before the event actually starts.
Play a remix you made from slapping sounds and crying children.
Champagne shower for everyone!
You take part in a few meaningless conversations
Hello! I am Bat-Wayne. I mean Bruce-Man. FUCK

Harvey holds an opening speech. He talks about the struggle many children are going through every day, and how he experienced the pain himself. It is very moving; you here some rich people dry their tears with $100 bills..
Yell: "Boo fucking hoo! Get over it princess!"
Crack jokes about how Dent seems like he was the kind of child that you just have to slap every now and then to the people in your vicinity.
"That speech was a bit lame, but not bat.. bad. I mean bad."
Applaud and cheer as the speech comes to an end.
The buffet is now open! People discuss boring topics like child abuse and brag about how much they work to support our youth.
Did someone say foodfight?!
"Whoever cooked this deserves a whooping.."
Steal roastbeef from your neighbours plate.
You cant find a knife, so you just casually use a Batarang for eating.
The main event - A charity auction - just started. People bid high sums on paintings and toys kids from a shelter made.
Scribble a dick on a childs painting.
Constantly mock the childrens names as they present their work.
Bid on a slightly unsettling painting because it reminds you of a cool bat.
Give a kid very in-depth feedback on their colour choices in a painting of Batman.
The auction was a great success, Harvey thanks everybody in a very emotional speech. Some people stick around for a few drinks, others begin to leave.
Get hammered on free drinks and smack random ladies butts while they pass by the bar.
Drunkenly hit on Harveys wife Gilda.
Order a Bat-Martini. You mean Martini.
Call in your Batmobile and disappear with screeching tires.
Time to get going so you show up for the lighting ceremony of the Grand Gotham Crhristmas Tree on time!
You're a bit late, a bit drunk and bring your Laborghini to a screetching halt, covering everybody nearby in grey snow mush.
You arrive a little early in a fancy sports car and steal the Mayors parking spot.
You make it just in time after beating up a group of thugs in a dark side alley. Wait, are you still wearing the cape?!
"Alfred! Prepare the Batmobile!"
The Mayor makes a boring speech about the proud history of Gotham or something
You ask your supermodel girlfriends what party they want to go to next
You ask loudly for more champagne to make the time pass more quickly
Join in with everybody cheering happily
Remind everybody of several instances when Batman saved the day. What a badass!
Supermodel Name McLastname gets called to the stage to push the switch to light the tree
"She could totally flip my switch!" ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Laugh out loudly when the light only flickers a bit due to an outage.
Cue slow clap.
The tree doesn't light up. Through your detective abilities you quickly find a broken cable and fix it!
You notice the tree leaning noticably to the left. What should you do?!
Huff and puff, trying to blow it over.
Impassively flick some small snowballs at it.
Alert a security guard so they can fix it before the tree falls over!
You pull out your bat-claw and straighten it using your almost superhuman muscles
A group of thugs in clownmasks appear on a nearby roof and start wreaking havoc!
Take cover behind the model!
Take cover behind the tree!
Grab a few confused people around you and drag them to cover!
Run away just seconds before Batman arrives to save the day once again!
Congratulations, you are an absolute asshat! But at least your secret is safe!
You managed to keep your secret identity safe!
Breaking News: Billionare Bruce Wayne secretly Batman?!
